name: Things Are A Little Dicey
description:
A 3D platformer using the spin of a dice who needs to find his way to the board game it belongs to.

In this third-person ice game you control a six-face dice with the ability to roll, jump and launch your way around to get over all the toys in your way!

Programming - Anthony Pallitta,  Joseph Adams.

3D - Cesar Cervera,  Akash S

Sound design and Music - Ana Quiñones, Jano Manzali

Producer - Solara Carrillo
